title: Molly McGinty Has a Really Good Day
description: Today, MollyLearned her wacky grandma was coming to spend the day at schoolwith her.Lost her Notebook with everything that matters in it, including her homework.Got a black eyeTore her skirtAnd itâ€™s only 9 a.m.Could things get any worse?You bet!
author: Gary Paulsen
